name: 2022 3rd European Advanced Educational Technology Conference
content: Publicationï¼š Accepted papers being presented at the conference will be recommended to published in International Journal of Learning and Teaching (IJLT), or International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) \* IJLT ISSN: 2377-2891(Print); 2377-2905(Online) | DOI: 10.18178/ijlt Abstracting/Indexing: Google Scholar; Crossref; IndexCopernicus, etc. \*IJIET ISSN: 2010-3689 | DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), EI(INSPEC, IET), EBSCO, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
